articles.title: Home computer legend Sir Clive Sinclair dies at 81 | Engadget
articles.description: Sir Clive Sinclair, who created the pocket calculator and one of the best-known early home PCs, has died at 81..
articles.content: The tech industry just lost one of its best-known inventors. The Guardianreports Sir Clive Sinclair died early on September 16th at 81 following a long illness. He's best known for his namesake compa… [+1469 chars]

articles.title: Sir Clive Sinclair, inventor behind Spectrum computer and C5, dies aged 81

articles.content:
